web_snippets: Andrew Porter is the author of four books, including the short story collection The Theory of Light and Matter (Vintage/Penguin Random House)
For other people named Andrew Porter, see Andrew Porter (disambiguation). ... Currently, Porter lives in San Antonio, Texas, where he is Professor of English at ...
Andrew Porter is the Director of the Creative Writing Program at Trinity, where he also teaches courses in Fiction Writing. He is the author of four books.
